Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish a School Transformation Zone, based on the model proposed by the NYC Coalition for Educational Justice, to improve low-performing schools and prevent school closings.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish a School Transformation Zone, based on the model proposed by the NYC Coalition for Educational Justice, to improve low-performing schools and prevent school closings.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish a School Transformation Zone, based on the model proposed by the NYC Coalition for Educational Justice, to improve low-performing schools and prevent school closings.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amended by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Brewer, Lander, Williams, Van Bramer, Ferreras, Reyna and Rivera.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish a School Transformation Zone, based on the model proposed by the NYC Coalition for Educational Justice, to improve low-performing schools and prevent school closings.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
